author: mandrenguyen
body:
#### PR description:

Reenable Run 3 heavy-ion relval workflows that were waiting for a pileup dataset to produced.
They were disabled in #29218
The input is set to GEN-SIM produced in 11_1_0_pre5 

#### PR validation:

Test on wfs 310,311,312

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

title: Reenable relval wfs 310, 311 and 312
